Package ie.atu.dip

Class InsuranceUtilities

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.dip.InsuranceUtilities
public class InsuranceUtilities extends Object
The `InsuranceUtilities` class provides utility methods for handling insurance-related calculations and operations.

  • Method Details

    • getInput

      public static int getInput(String prompt, Scanner scanner, InputValidator validator)
      Prompts the user for input, validates it using the provided `InputValidator`, and returns the valid input.
      Parameters:
      prompt - The prompt message to display to the user.
      scanner - The `Scanner` object used for reading user input.
      validator - The `InputValidator` object used for validating the input.
      Returns:
      Returns the valid input entered by the user.

    • printInsuranceDetails

      public void printInsuranceDetails(int basicInsurance, int accidents, int surcharge, InsuranceCalculator calculator)
      Prints the insurance details based on the number of accidents and the calculated surcharge.
      Parameters:
      basicInsurance - The basic insurance amount.
      accidents - The number of accidents.
      surcharge - The surcharge amount.
      calculator - The `InsuranceCalculator` object used for calculating the additional surcharge.
